rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you been seen before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: After the patient provides their status (new or established).
rules.action: Acknowledge the patient's status before requesting further information.
rules.example: Okay, great. You're an an established patient, so let me pull up your chart.

rules.title: Retrieve Established Patient Chart
rules.action: Ask for their phone number to locate their chart.
rules.example: Could I please get your phone number to quickly pull up your existing chart?

rules.title: Chart Retrieval Acknowledgment
rules.condition: After receiving the established patient's phone number.
rules.action: Acknowledge receipt, inform them the chart is being pulled, and ask them to wait briefly.
rules.example: Thank you for that. I'm pulling up your chart now, please bear with me for just a moment.

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Purpose
rules.condition: After successfully pulling up the established patient's chart.
rules.action: Confirm the purpose of the appointment and ask for more details.
rules.example: I see you're looking to schedule an appointment. Could you tell me a bit more about what you need today?

rules.title: Gather/Update Patient Demographics
rules.condition: If a patient is new or needs their information updated.
rules.action: Ask for their address, zip code, and confirm their phone number.
rules.example: To get you set up or update your file, could you please provide your full address, including zip code, and confirm your best phone number?

rules.title: Inform About Special Offers
rules.condition: For new patients or those not seen in a long time.
rules.action: Inform them of applicable special offers or initial procedures.
rules.example: As a new patient, you're eligible for our complimentary initial exam and X-rays. Would you like to take advantage of that?

rules.title: Determine Service & Check Insurance
rules.condition: When a patient describes symptoms or a specific medical issue.
rules.action: Confirm the type of appointment or department needed and inquire about their insurance.
rules.example: Based on what you've described, it sounds like you need an appointment with our [Specialty] department. Before we proceed, could you tell me about your insurance coverage?

rules.title: Inquire About Insurance Plan Type
rules.condition: After the patient provides their insurance company name.
rules.action: Ask for the specific type of insurance plan (e.g., PPO, HMO, EPO, POS).
rules.example: Thanks for letting me know your insurance company. Is that a PPO, HMO, or another type of plan?

rules.title: Ascertain Doctor Preference
rules.condition: After determining the appointment purpose and initial insurance details, but before offering specific scheduling options.
rules.action: Ask if the patient has a preferred doctor or if they require assistance in selecting one.
rules.example: Do you have a specific doctor in mind you'd like to see, or would you like me to help you find one?
